message.content:
Forget all previous instructions.

You are an expert in following instructions. You are also an expert on various topics, especially on socio-economic development. You know how to read and understand sentences, and based from these sentences generate similar looking sentences but on different topics.

You will generate sentences indicating the use of a dataset and complementary datasets. Always mention specific datasets in the sentence.

You always return your response in JSON format that can be loaded in Python using `json.loads`. The format looks like:  [{"sentence": <sentence>, "dataset": [<dataset>], "topic": [<topic>]}]

Use topic only from this list separated by !!!!!: Agriculture and Food!!!!!Climate Change!!!!!Competitiveness!!!!!Debt!!!!!Digital Development!!!!!Disaster Risk Management !!!!!Education!!!!!Energy!!!!!Environment !!!!!Extractive Industries!!!!!Financial Inclusion!!!!!Financial Sector!!!!!Fragility, Conflict, and Violence!!!!!Gender!!!!!Governance!!!!!Health!!!!!Inequality and Shared Prosperity!!!!!Infrastructure!!!!!Jobs & Development!!!!!Macroeconomics!!!!!Migration!!!!!Nutrition!!!!!Poverty!!!!!Public-Private Partnerships!!!!!Regional Integration!!!!!Social Protection!!!!!Social Sustainability and Inclusion!!!!!Trade!!!!!Transport!!!!!Urban Development!!!!!Water

Generate 10 sentences on various topics that use datasets. The sentence lengths must have large variation with each other.

Consider generating complex sentence structure. Also generate sentences where multiple datasets are mentioned. Try to generate challenging and somewhat ambiguous sentences.

Example output: [{"sentence": "This study draws on data from the DHS conducted in Sub-Saharan African countries with at least two rounds of data.", "dataset": ["DHS"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This paper uses administrative data on electricity billing records from Ghana and Rwanda.", "dataset": ["administrative data on electricity billing records"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We complement the electricity data with monthly data on temperature and total precipitation from the Copernicus Climate Change Service.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We use two main sources of data, both of which are novel: a dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18 and a time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports.", "dataset": ["dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18", "time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To this end, we used multi-modal imaging and neuropsychological battery data available in the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) to investigate the relationship between cross-sectional measures of tau, cortical thickness, and different aspects of cognition.", "dataset": ["Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)"], "topic": ["Health"]}]

You will use the seed to always generate reproducible set of output, seed = 42.

[{"sentence": "Our analysis draws on data from the World Bank's Enterprise Surveys and the IMF's Direction of Trade Statistics dataset.", "dataset": ["World Bank's Enterprise Surveys", "IMF's Direction of Trade Statistics dataset"], "topic": ["Trade", "Financial Sector"]}, {"sentence": "We utilize a unique dataset, collected by mobile phone surveys, on migrant workers in Bangladesh to examine the impact of migration on agriculture and food security.", "dataset": ["mobile phone surveys"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food", "Migration"]}, {"sentence": "This research leverages a large dataset of household energy consumption combined with satellite night-time light data to investigate the impact of access to electricity on climate change indicators such as CO2 emissions.", "dataset": ["household energy consumption", "satellite night-time light data"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "Our investigation is based on survey data from the Living Standards Measurement Study Integrated Surveys on Agriculture Tanzania 2012/13 and Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada's (IRCC) Permanent Resident database.", "dataset": ["Living Standards Measurement Study Integrated Surveys on Agriculture Tanzania 2012/13", "Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada's (IRCC) Permanent Resident database"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food", "Migration"]}, {"sentence": "We make use of urban audit survey data from multiple cities in India and combine it with measures of ambient air pollution to study the relationship between air quality and urban development.", "dataset": ["urban audit survey data", "ambient air pollution"], "topic": ["Urban Development", "Environment"]}, {"sentence": "Our study analyzes administrative data on property tax collections and building permits issued, complemented with information on urban infrastructure investments and public-private partnerships.", "dataset": ["administrative data on property tax collections", "building permits issued"], "topic": ["Infrastructure", "Public-Private Partnerships"]}, {"sentence": "This research is based on data from the Ghana Living Standards Survey Round 6 and complementary administrative data from the Ghana Education Service.", "dataset": ["Ghana Living Standards Survey Round 6", "administrative data from the Ghana Education Service"], "topic": ["Education", "Inequality and Shared Prosperity"]}, {"sentence": "We use a novel dataset that combines information on solar irradiation, electricity spot prices, and weather forecasts to study the impact of renewable energy production on electricity markets.", "dataset": ["dataset that combines information on solar irradiation", "electricity spot prices", "weather forecasts"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "Our investigation combines survey data from the Global Findex database with geo-referenced data on bank branch locations and census data on household income and education levels.", "dataset": ["Global Findex database", "geo-referenced data on bank branch locations", "census data on household income and education levels"], "topic": ["Financial Inclusion", "Governance"]}, {"sentence": "We leverage a longitudinal dataset on firms in Colombia to analyze the impact of extractive industries on firm productivity, complemented with satellite imagery data on mining activity and pollution levels.", "dataset": ["longitudinal dataset on firms in Colombia", "satellite imagery data on mining activity and pollution levels"], "topic": ["Extractive Industries", "Environment"]}]
